update m_function_info
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
function_name = #{functionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
function_code = #{functionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update m_function_info set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, function_name = #{functionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, function_code = #{functionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, function_desc = #{functionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where function_id = #{functionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT f.function_id, f.parent_id, f.function_name, f.function_code, f.function_desc, f.priority, f.menu_id FROM m_function as f WHERE f.delete_flag = 0 order by priority asc
